name: ROBLOX Game Page +
description: Check out my new theme! Please install the ROBLOX+ Chrome extension and enable "OBC theme" for the best experience. ONLY EFFECTS URLS STARTING WITH ROBLOX.COM/GAMES Improves the ROBLOX websites game page by using a combination of dark and light colors.

user.name: FCEFEAR
user.about: I never thought I'd want to learn how to code in CSS but I began to use Reddit a lot more and started doing CSS over there for various subreddits. Then I discovered Stylish and learnt much more about the language. Check out my themes, I hope you like them. If you have any requests the quickest way to contact me is through my reddit /u/FCEFEAR or my ROBLOX account, FCEFEAR.

additional_info:
Update log:

v8- Cleared up outdated code.
v7- Added support to a few ROBLOX Chrome extensions. Still limited support.
v6- Added support to certain pages
v5- Modified store tab, party chat and other buttons.
v4- Bug fixes
v3- Edited footer notes
v2- Added new style buttons
v1- Released onto public domain

Notes:

Change URL in code to alter the background.

The code here is really messy. I have never done any CSS before so don't expect it to be perfect. It has its flaws.
